title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 914.1 - Required tools
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 914.1 - Required tools

State Regulations

Every railroad corporation operating the road by steam in
this State shall provide: (a) In every
steel body car operated in any passenger train one set of tools consisting of
at least a sledge hammer and a crowbar. (b) In every closed wooden body car operated
in any passenger train one set of tools consisting of an axe, a sledge hammer, a crowbar and a hand saw. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
914.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
